refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GEnum ├── GstPlayerColorBalanceType ├── GstPlayerError ╰── GstPlayerState GInterface ├── GstPlayerSignalDispatcher ╰── GstPlayerVideoRenderer GObject ╰── GInitiallyUnowned ╰── GstObject ╰── GstPlayer

refsect2.title: gst_player_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GstPlayer instance that uses signal_dispatcher to dispatch signals to some event loop system, or emits signals directly if NULL is passed. See gst_player_g_main_context_signal_dispatcher_new().
Video is going to be rendered by video_renderer , or if NULL is provided no special video set up will be done and some default handling will be performed.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GstPlayer instance

refsect2.title: gst_player_play ()
refsect2.para: Request to play the loaded stream.

refsect2.title: gst_player_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stops playing the current stream and resets to the first position in the stream.

refsect2.title: gst_player_seek ()
refsect2.para: Seeks the currently-playing stream to the absolute position time in nanoseconds.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_uri ()
refsect2.para: Sets the next URI to play.

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_uri ()
refsect2.para: Gets the URI of the currently-playing stream.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a string containing the URI of the currently-playing stream. g_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_duration ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the duration of the media stream that self represents.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the duration of the currently-playing media stream, in nanoseconds.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the absolute position time, in nanoseconds, of the currently-playing stream.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_volume ()
refsect2.para: Sets the volume level of the stream as a percentage between 0 and 1.

entry.para: the new volume level, as a percentage between 0 and 1

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_mute ()
refsect2.para: TRUE if the currently-playing stream should be muted.

entry.para: Mute state the should be set

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_volume ()
refsect2.para: Returns the current volume level, as a percentage between 0 and 1.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the volume as percentage between 0 and 1.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the currently-playing stream is muted.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The internal playbin instance.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_config ()
refsect2.para: Set the configuration of the player. If the player is already configured, and the configuration haven't change, this function will return TRUE. If the player is not in the GST_PLAYER_STATE_STOPPED, this method will return FALSE and active configuration will remain.
config is a GstStructure that contains the configuration parameters for the player.
This function takes ownership of config .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE when the configuration could be set. Since 1.10

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_config ()
refsect2.para: Get a copy of the current configuration of the player. This configuration can either be modified and used for the gst_player_set_config() call or it must be freed after usage.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a copy of the current configuration of player . Use gst_structure_free() after usage or gst_player_set_config().
Since 1.10.

refsect2.title: gst_player_state_get_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets a string representing the given state.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a string with the name of the state.

refsect2.title: gst_player_error_get_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets a string representing the given error.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a string with the given error.

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_media_info ()
refsect2.para: A Function to get the current media info GstPlayerMediaInfo instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: media info instance.
The caller should free it with g_object_unref().

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE or FALSE
Sets the audio track stream_idex .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE or FALSE
Sets the video track stream_index .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE or FALSE
Sets the subtitle strack stream_index .

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_current_audio_track ()
refsect2.para: A Function to get current audio GstPlayerAudioInfo instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: current audio track.
The caller should free it with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_current_video_track ()
refsect2.para: A Function to get current video GstPlayerVideoInfo instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: current video track.
The caller should free it with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_current_subtitle_track ()
refsect2.para: A Function to get current subtitle GstPlayerSubtitleInfo instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: current subtitle track.
The caller should free it with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_audio_track_enabled ()
refsect2.para: Enable or disable the current audio track.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_video_track_enabled ()
refsect2.para: Enable or disable the current video track.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_subtitle_track_enabled ()
refsect2.para: Enable or disable the current subtitle track.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: URI of the current external subtitle. g_free() after usage.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the visualizations was set correctly. Otherwise, FALSE.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Name of the currently enabled visualization. g_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_player_color_balance_type_get_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets a string representing the given color balance type.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a string with the name of the color balance type.

refsect2.title: gst_player_has_color_balance ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether the player has color balance support available.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if player has color balance support. Otherwise, FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_color_balance ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_player_set_color_balance (GstPlayer *player, GstPlayerColorBalanceType type, gdouble value);
refsect2.para: Sets the current value of the indicated channel type to the passed value.

entry.para: The new value for the type , ranged [0,1]

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_color_balance ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current value of the indicated type .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The current value of type , between [0,1]. In case of error -1 is returned.

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_multiview_mode ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current value of the indicated type .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The current value of type , Default: -1 "none"

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_multiview_mode ()
refsect2.para: Sets the current value of the indicated mode type to the passed value.

entry.para: The new value for the type

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_multiview_flags ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current value of the indicated type .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The current value of type , Default: 0x00000000 "none

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_multiview_flags ()
refsect2.para: Sets the current value of the indicated mode type to the passed value.

entry.para: The new value for the type

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_audio_video_offset ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current value of audio-video-offset property

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The current value of audio-video-offset in nanoseconds
Since 1.10

refsect2.title: gst_player_set_audio_video_offset ()
refsect2.para: Sets audio-video-offset property by value of offset

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: current playback rate

refsect2.title: gst_player_get_video_snapshot ()
refsect2.para:
Get a snapshot of the currently selected video stream, if any. The format can be selected with format and optional configuration is possible with config
Currently supported settings are:

listitem.para: pixel-aspect-ratio of type GST_TYPE_FRACTION Except for GST_PLAYER_THUMBNAIL_RAW_NATIVE format, if no config is set, pixel-aspect-ratio would be 1/1

entry.para: output format of the video snapshot

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Current video snapshot sample or NULL on failure
Since 1.12.

refsect2.title: gst_player_config_set_position_update_interval ()
refsect2.para: set interval in milliseconds between two position-updated signals. pass 0 to stop updating the position. Since 1.10

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: current position update interval in milliseconds
Since 1.10

refsect2.title: gst_player_config_set_user_agent ()
refsect2.para: Set the user agent to pass to the server if player needs to connect to a server during playback. This is typically used when playing HTTP or RTSP streams.

entry.para: the string to use as user agent

refsect2.title: gst_player_config_get_user_agent ()
refsect2.para: Return the user agent which has been configured using gst_player_config_set_user_agent() if any.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the configured agent, or NULL Since 1.10.

refsect2.title: gst_player_config_set_seek_accurate ()
refsect2.para: Enable or disable accurate seeking. When enabled, elements will try harder to seek as accurately as possible to the requested seek position. Generally it will be slower especially for formats that don't have any indexes or timestamp markers in the stream.
If accurate seeking is disabled, elements will seek as close as the request position without slowing down seeking too much.
Accurate seeking is disabled by default.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if accurate seeking is enabled
Since 1.12

entry.para: the player is currently playing a stream.

refsect2.title: struct GstPlayerSignalDispatcherInterface
struct GstPlayerVideoRendererInterface
The audio-video-offset property
refsect2.para: The synchronisation offset between audio and video in nanoseconds.

refsect2.title: The signal-dispatcher property
refsect2.para: Dispatcher for the signals to e.g. event loops.

refsect2.title: The video-multiview-flags property
refsect2.para: Override details of the multiview frame layout.

refsect2.title: The video-multiview-mode property
refsect2.para: Re-interpret a video stream as one of several frame-packed stereoscopic modes.

refsect2.title: The video-renderer property
refsect2.para: Video renderer to use for rendering videos.
